title: Electric field between plates of capacitors

content.question: Suppose all three capacitors are connected in parallel with a 9 V battery. Which of the following is true of the electric field between the plates?

choices.label: It is the same for I and III and least for II.
It is the same for I and II and least for III.

content.answer: It is the same for I and III and least for II.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
